name: Cursed Remedy
description:
Made by: InfokubArcade, Fitzy and Clammiee

Main player programming: InfokubArcade

A.I. programming: Clammiee

Level design and music/ sounds: Fitzy

This game is about a village that was cursed by an evil witch. The villagers randomly get ill by all sorts of diseases. Only you can save them! They come to you since you are a descendant of wizardry and can cure them by making the perfect concoction. Little do they know that you're experience is limited. Try your best to find the exact remedy required for every specific illnesses. Muahahahaha!
